b'@KumovaTolga @AsennaWealth Agree.
Though #Zinc looking good for 2021 and belond, $NCZ management should capitalise the opportunity well.

Good Luck for being LT holder.
I am just ST-MT traders, buy Mid-Large cap at low & wait for short squeeze spike to get out on some good St-MT profit.'

b'@FunTechalyst @AsennaWealth They need to be nimble.

I suspect a fair few of those shorts have covered. They got the macro right.

I am just hoping $NCZ management are able to capitalise on the #zinc price!!!'

b'@AsennaWealth Short trades have very short life line, so one got to time really well and most imp must know when to close when things goes wrong.
Limited profit Vs Unlimited Losses :)

I naturally love Short squeeze
$NCZ @KumovaTolga :)'

Fundamentals have improved for this producer meanwhile share price remains disconnected.

IMO I expect move into zone 2 pretty quickly and track into zone 3. 

One to watch with significant upside. https://t.co/zmmNN9KhDT'
